title: Best ad campaigns worldwide 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Campaign/Brand (Agency) in the x axis and Number of points in the y axis.

The maximum Number of points 75.2 is found at Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) and the minimum is found at Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York) where Campaign/Brand (Agency) is 44.0.

There is a difference of 31.2 between the maximum Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) and minimum Campaign/Brand (Agency) Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York).
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Campaign/Brand (Agency), and Number of points in each Campaign/Brand (Agency) on the y axis.

The maximum Number of points 75.2 is found at Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) and the minimum is found at Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York) where Campaign/Brand (Agency) is 44.0.

max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Campaign/Brand (Agency), and Number of points in each Campaign/Brand (Agency) on the y axis.

The maximum Number of points 75.2 is found at Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) and the minimum is found at Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York) where Campaign/Brand (Agency) is 44.0.
The second highest Number of points is appeared to be the Campaign/Brand (Agency) Healthy Hands Chalk Sticks / Savlon (Ogilvy Mumbai).

The highest value at Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) is 1.71x times more than the lowest value at Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York).

Number of points at Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) is 75.2 , second place is Healthy Hands Chalk Sticks / Savlon (Ogilvy Mumbai) at 72.8, and thirdly is India's Newest Status Symbol / Harpic (McCann New Delhi) at 63.3.
The lowest value 44.0 at Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York) is almost 1.32 times smaller than the average value 56.92.
